title: 166 - Tim Who?
description:
Join the crew as Luke mans the producer's chair with TIm out and about this week. They discuss being in control, a quick tribute to the queen, and then answer questions from the audience, with a few rabbit trails of wisdom along the way.

Big Thanks To Our Sponsors!
